languages.text: "Со скорбью вынуждена сообщить, что мощности нашего главного калибра не хватит, чтобы полностью уничтожить судно. Остов глубоко уходит в ледник, который послужит своего рода панцирем на пути нашего удара".

traits.locale_text: "Со скорбью вынуждена сообщить, что мощности нашего главного калибра не хватит, чтобы полностью уничтожить судно. Остов глубоко уходит в ледник, который послужит своего рода панцирем на пути нашего удара".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "It is with regret that I report our main battery will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier, shielding the target against our strike."
languages.original_text: "Со скорбью вынуждена сообщить, что мощности нашего главного калибра не хватит, чтобы полностью уничтожить судно. Остов глубоко уходит в ледник, который послужит своего рода панцирем на пути нашего удара".

traits.locale_text: "I is with regret that I report the power of our main calibre will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier that is shielding the target against our strike."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "I is with regret that I report the power of our main calibre will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier that is shielding the target against our strike."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "It is with regret that I report our main battery will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier, shielding the target against our strike."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "It is with regret that I report our main battery will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier, shielding the target against our strike."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "It is with regret that I report our main battery will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier, shielding the target against our strike."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « Je suis au regret de vous informer que notre batterie principale ne suffira pas à détruire entièrement le vaisseau. Sa coque est trop profondément enfoncée dans le glacier, ce dernier le protège d'une frappe orbitale. »
languages.original_text: "It is with regret that I report our main battery will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier, shielding the target against our strike."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis au regret de vous informer que notre batterie principale ne suffira pas à détruire entièrement le vaisseau. Sa coque est trop profondément enfoncée dans le glacier, ce dernier le protège d'une frappe orbitale. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “我很遗憾地通知您，我们主炮的能量不足以完全摧毁这艘船。船体深入冰川，我们的炮火无法穿透冰层。”
languages.original_text: "It is with regret that I report our main battery will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier, shielding the target against our strike."

traits.locale_text: “我很遗憾地通知您，我们主炮的能量不足以完全摧毁这艘船。船体深入冰川，我们的炮火无法穿透冰层。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Ich muss mit Bedauern berichten, dass unsere Hauptbatterie nicht ausreichen wird, um das Schiff vollständig zu zerstören. Der Rumpf liegt tief im Gletscher, was das Ziel vor unserem Angriff schützt."
languages.original_text: "It is with regret that I report our main battery will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier, shielding the target against our strike."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss mit Bedauern berichten, dass unsere Hauptbatterie nicht ausreichen wird, um das Schiff vollständig zu zerstören. Der Rumpf liegt tief im Gletscher, was das Ziel vor unserem Angriff schützt."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Lamento informarle de que nuestra batería principal no es suficiente para destruir la nave. El casco está profundamente hundido en el glaciar, lo que protege al objetivo de cualquier ataque».
languages.original_text: "It is with regret that I report our main battery will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier, shielding the target against our strike."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento informarle de que nuestra batería principal no es suficiente para destruir la nave. El casco está profundamente hundido en el glaciar, lo que protege al objetivo de cualquier ataque».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「残念ながら、こちらの主砲に船を完全に破壊できるほどの力はありません。船体は氷河の奥深くに入り込み、こちらの攻撃から標的を守っています」
languages.original_text: "It is with regret that I report our main battery will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier, shielding the target against our strike."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、こちらの主砲に船を完全に破壊できるほどの力はありません。船体は氷河の奥深くに入り込み、こちらの攻撃から標的を守っています」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Üzülerek söylemem gerekiyor ki ana bataryamız, gemiyi tamamen yok etmek için yeterli olmayacaktır. Gövde, buzulun derinliklerine doğru gidiyor ve saldırılarımıza karşı hedefe kalkan oluyor."
languages.original_text: "It is with regret that I report our main battery will not be enough to fully destroy the vessel. The hull goes deep into the glacier, shielding the target against our strike."
